name: Snakefight
description:
Snakefight is a short local PvP experience, where each player controlls one end of the snake, and their goal is to kill the other player.

In case you cant get a local friend you can use the 3rd party software "Parsec" to play the game online.

controlls: 

red - wasd

blue - arrow keys

Art Dave:

 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCArdy2WdC7LLD4nQhVpRTFg/featured

Music: MXE
